meaningMnemonic: The <radical>ability</radical> to <radical>boil</radical> is one of the main abilities of a <kanji>bear</kanji>.
readingMnemonic:
A <kanji>bear</kanji> boiling in front of you should fill you with great honor. Or, as they say in Latin: Magma <reading>cum</reading> (くま) laude.

Get it? A little hot bear humor for you.
